QuestData.Title: The Depravity of the Forsaken
QuestData.Description: We nearly have this battle won, $n. I can taste victory. The Forsaken never stood a...$b$bWhat the hell is that!?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find out what Thassarian is looking at.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Thassarian about what you just saw.
QuestData.RewardText: Val'kyr? Koltira brought val'kyr to this fight? Has he gone mad?$b$bNo, this is not Koltira's work. This was Sylvanas.
